title: Loving Hut
typeOfFood: Vegan, Thai, Western, Delivery, Take-out, Asian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Serves all vegan food, non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan desserts. Nice interior, free Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: 16/80-81 Moo 13 Phahon Yothin Road, Phra Phutthabat
